scheme_name: Scheme for Awarding Fellowships for Undergraduate and Postgraduate Students
nodal_department: Agriculture, Farmers Welfare and Cooperation Department
brief_description: The "Scheme for Awarding Fellowships for Undergraduate and Postgraduate Students" provides financial support in the form of monthly scholarships to students pursuing higher education in various faculties at Anand Agricultural University.
detailed_description: The &quot;Scheme for Awarding Fellowships for Undergraduate and Postgraduate Students&quot; launched by the Agriculture, Farmers Welfare and Cooperation Department, Gujarat, aims to provide monthly financial assistance to qualified undergraduate, postgraduate, and Ph.D. students at Anand Agricultural University.
benefits: Undergraduate Students: ₹500/- per month for 12 months. Postgraduate Students: ₹1,500/- per month for 12 months. Ph.D. Student: ₹2,000/- per month for 12 months.
eligibility_criteria: The applicant must be a regular full‑time student enrolled in an undergraduate/ postgraduate or Ph.D. program at Anand Agricultural University. The student should not avail any other Scholarship/ Fellowship concurrently with this one. The family income of the student should not exceed ₹6,00,000/- per year.

steps: Step 1: Write an application on plain paper addressed to the Director, Anand Agricultural University.
Step 2: Submit the completed application along with the necessary documents to the Principal of the college.

documents_required: Graduate Mark Sheet. Mark sheet of 12th Std. Passport Size Photos. Post Graduate Mark sheet.
